data.name: Megadimension Neptunia VIIR - Dengeki Set | 電撃セット | 電擊妮套組
data.detailed_description:
Shock your friends with the Dengeki Set, which includes 3 sets to customize Neptune, Uzume, and the Gold Third crew! The Dengeki Set includes:
Dengeki Neptune Weapon Set
Weapon - Dengeki Sword, Rough Draft

Dengeki Uzume Costume Weapon Set
Weapon - Polytan Megaphone
Costume - Dengeki Suit
Accessory - Dengeki Pin

Dengeki Gold Third Costume Set
S-Sha
Costume - Dengeki  Soldier's Suit
Accessory - Dengeki Earring
B-Sha
Costume - Dengeki Layered
Accessory - Dengeki Cap
C-Sha
Costume - Dengeki Battle Suit
Accessory - Dengeki Beret
K-Sha
Costume - Dengeki One-Piece
Accessory - Dengeki Headband

fullgame.name: Megadimension Neptunia VIIR | 新次元ゲイム ネプテューヌＶⅡＲ | 新次元遊戲 戰機少女ＶⅡＲ

data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 32bit, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 1GB VRAM or more and compatibility with Direct X 11.0 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960、ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound compatible sound card
